name: Regigigas
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

poke_body.name: Recover Mechanism
poke_body.effect: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to Regigigas, remove all Special Conditions from Regigigas.

attacks.name: Gigaton Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
